title: Help me help! Game wont patch, hex repair is crashing
body:
Do I need to uninstall/reinstall?
When I turn on the client it says 'cant start, attempting to load an older version, then restarts and gives the same message (on an infinite loop).
Hex repair with 'force repatch' crashes

replies.body:
Your installation might have run into some problems during the patch or otherwise ended up with some damaged or missing game files, so you *may* need to resort to using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and doing a clean uninstall/reinstall. 

Before jumping to that, I'd be sure to try adjusting my firewall/antivirus settings with the steps found [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3). If it doesn't work, and you don't want to try the reinstall yet, let me know and we can try digging a little further.

as mentioned in OP, hextech repair keeps crashing

Sorry about that, you mentioned the force repatch crashes and I was hoping the other features might work (since it sounded like the tool would open and only crash on force repair). 

Have you been able to try the other steps mentioned at all?

I am having a similar problem of infinite client repairs during the loading screen when ever i try to find a game, and it counts towards a loss. I also tried the hex repair tool and uninstall reinstall and to no avail did it work if there is another way to resolve this issue i would be thankful. 
As of this moment my league of legends is unplayable and only gaining penalties from leave-buster. Immediate help will be much appreciated...

I am having the same issue. This happens to me almost every time they do an update.  I have found the only solution is to uninstall and then reinstall, which is very annoying.

edit:
I was finally able to login without having to uninstall. I just kept closing it, until the loading bar was where the play button is (top right corner) and then i was able to login. If you don't have the patience, as I often don't, continue with the uninstall :(
